subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Jose Garoffalo bought Wildcat Red for his owners last year for $30,000 and embarked on a wild ride that stops next at the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Jose Garoffalo bought Wildcat Red for his owners last year for $30,000 and embarked on a wild ride that stops next at the Kentucky Derby.
